about_the_game:
This DLC will allow you to enable swimsuit outfits for the main cast! You can finally live out the fantasy of seeing them half naked!

Access the DLC by going to Extra>DLC. Each character can be toggled individually; these settings can be changed at any point. This will not replace 100% of character models, only sprites will be changed; CGs and other backgrounds will not be affected. Text is also unaltered, so some lines may not make sense when they’re wearing swimsuits. However, this will 100% ruin the game, so please do not use this on your first playthrough.

This DLC was made for fun and is mostly meant to act as a way to support the game.
detailed_description:
This DLC will allow you to enable swimsuit outfits for the main cast! You can finally live out the fantasy of seeing them half naked!

Access the DLC by going to Extra>DLC. Each character can be toggled individually; these settings can be changed at any point. This will not replace 100% of character models, only sprites will be changed; CGs and other backgrounds will not be affected. Text is also unaltered, so some lines may not make sense when they’re wearing swimsuits. However, this will 100% ruin the game, so please do not use this on your first playthrough.

This DLC was made for fun and is mostly meant to act as a way to support the game.
legal_notice: All characters depicted are 18+ in every part of the game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 74 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 74 MB available space

name: No Recollection - Swimsuit DLC!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 74 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
